document_data.name: Pliinki
document_data.mainbody: '''Pliinki''' was a mad [[derro]] savant and a member of the [[Gray Ghosts]] thieves guild in [[Gracklstugh]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Pliinki believed that the Gray Ghosts' obelisk was hidden in its location by [[Diirinka]] herself and that rebuilding it would grant "unimaginable power" that she could use to conquer the city.
document_data.History: She was tasked by the guild's leaders with the mission of rebuilding the obelisk, assisted by a [[spectator]]. ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], she was waiting for the delivery of a fragment from [[Droki]].
